title: Playful Pluto [silent] [edited version]
creator_credit: Walt Disney Productions and Joseph Schenck
brief_description: An animated cartoon starring Mickey Mouse and Pluto. A series of wacky slapstick comedy scenes as Pluto leads Mickey from one catastrophe to the next, all stemming from a fight with the hose in the backyard.
description: An animated cartoon starring Mickey Mouse and Pluto. A series of wacky slapstick comedy scenes as Pluto leads Mickey from one catastrophe to the next, all stemming from a fight with the hose in the backyard.
